title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the SpaceDebrisTracker system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the SpaceDebrisTracker system, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations such as scalability, fault tolerance, and security.

title: Data Acquisition and Processing
description: Develop methods for acquiring and processing data on space debris from various sources.

title: Debris Tracking and Prediction
description: Implement algorithms and models for tracking and predicting the movement of space debris.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database to store and manage space debris data, including information about the debris objects (size, mass, material, orbit parameters, etc.), their current and predicted trajectories, potential collision risks with operational satellites or spacecraft, and any relevant metadata or historical data.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop a user interface for visualizing and interacting with space debris data and predictions.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms for the SpaceDebrisTracker system.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement test plans and quality assurance processes for the SpaceDebrisTracker system.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and DevOps processes for the SpaceDebrisTracker system.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the SpaceDebrisTracker system.
